mapper.select:
select COUNT(*) from tbd_publnd_mng pm where del_yn = 'N'
and year = #{yearOption}
select MAX(publnd_no) as publnd_no from tbd_publnd_mng
select code , code_nm from comtccmmndetailcode c where c.code_id = 'J0200' order by code_nm

select publnd_no , ctrt_ymd , cntrctpd , locplc , ldcg_cd , ar , loan_ar , loan_prpos , rrno , loanmn_sndng_yn , nm , addr , zip , cttpc , rm , nht_sndng , atch_papers , cnfirm_matter , year from tbd_publnd_mng where publnd_no = #{publndNo}
select distinct year from tbd_publnd_mng order by year desc

select pm.publnd_no , pa.publnd_se , pm.locplc , pm.ldcg_cd , c.code_nm ldcg_cd_nm , pm.ar , pa.oalp , pm.rm , pm.addr , pm.nm , pa.possesn_ar , pa.possesn_cn , pm.cttpc , pa.loan_posbl_yn , pa.bsrp_cn , pa.exmnr , pa.atch_file_id , pa.satlit_photo_sn , pa.spt_photo_sn from ( select publnd_no , locplc , ldcg_cd , ar , rm , addr , nm , cttpc from tbd_publnd_mng where publnd_no = #{publndNo} ) pm left join tbd_pbprt_accdt pa on (pa.publnd_no=pm.publnd_no) inner join comtccmmndetailcode c on (c.code_id = 'J0200' and c.code=pm.ldcg_cd)
select count(*) from tbd_pbprt_accdt where publnd_no = #{publndNo} and atch_file_id is not null
select file_sn::text , file_stre_cours , stre_file_nm , file_extsn from comtnfiledetail where atch_file_id = #{atchFileId} and file_sn = #{fileSn}::numeric
